p: To further determine the inhibitory effects of chalcone D6 against LSD1 in MOLT-4 cells, amount of two reported LSD1 substrates H3K9me1 and H3K9me2 were analysed by western blotting experiments. As shown in Figure 8, the amount of H3K9me1 and H3K9me2 showed a concentration dependent accumulation in the presence of chalcone D6. In addition, the treatment of D6 in MOLT-4 cells did not affect the expression level of LSD1. Collectively, these results suggested that chalcone D6 is a cellular active LSD1 inhibitor in leukaemia MOLT-4 cells.
